title: Ticket #2297: Synchronize Condor and ClassAds releases
description:
We want to synchronize the releases of Condor and ClassAds in order to reduce overhead in the release process.

Items:

  • Use Condor version for ClassAds
    • Jump ClassAds version to match current Condor version [DONE]
    • Change ClassAds shared library version to match current Condor version [DONE]
    • Change ClassAds code to get version from CMake [DONE]
  • Update ClassAds standalone release
    • Ensure configure-based and cmake-based builds are equivalent
      • In cmake build, ldd says libclassad.so doesn't depend on libdl or libpcre, though it should [DONE]
      • In cmake build, classad binaries are statically linked to libclassad [DONE]
      • bin/cxi isn't created in cmake build. If we want to keep it, we should rename it and create in the cmake build.
    • Create ClassAds-only source release based on CMake
    • Remove configure-based build files
  • Remove non-namespace build option for ClassAds [DONE]
